title: Volume Mixer Reset
body: Halfway through season 5, my volume mixer for league would reset with every update, meaning I'd break my ears getting into a game for the first time every patch. Is there any way to fix this because it seems like I'm the only one.

replies.body:
Oh no, sorry for your ears.  :(  Your config might be corrupt and failing to save your settings.  Resetting that should fix things up:

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings. 

I hope that helps!
Sorry for the confusion, it's not the in game volume mixer, but the mixer controlling all of my laptop's audio.
